entry.title: Shea Butter (unrefined) - Keeps Skin Soft, Supple & Healthy
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Skin Care
Price: 109.50

Earth Tribe's Shea Butter (125 g) is an ancient African beauty product that has been used for centuries to hydrate, revitalise and repair skin. Deeply nourishes and repairs the most damaged skin, ethically sourced and regarded as a Superfood for your skin.

  • Raw Shea Butter is high in oleic and many other essential fatty acids that make it ideal for moisturising and repairing dry or damaged skin
  • Contains high traces of vitamins A & E
  • Soothes sunburn, rashes, cracked heels, elbows, knees & chapped lips
  • Hydrates dry skin, dry scalp and dry lips
  • Anti-inflammatory and anti-ageing
  • Stimulates hair growth and heals scarring

Ingredients

100% pure unrefined Shea Butter from Ghana

Directions for use

Massage the luxurious Shea Butter into areas in need, twice daily, for best results.

Caution: Not suitable for those allergic to nuts or latex.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Cassava Flour - Gluten-Free Flour For Cooking and Baking
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Superfoods
Price: 115.00

Earth Tribe's Cassava Flour (1 kg) comes from the whole Cassava root which is a starchy tuber, native to South America, brought to Africa by Portuguese traders in the 16th century. Similar to wheat flour, it's popularly used as a Gluten-free starch.

  • High in fiber and an excellent source of saponins - phytochemicals that help lower unhealthy cholesterol levels in your bloodstream
  • One of the richest sources of carbohydrates and a good source of minerals such as Calcium, Phosphorus, Manganese, Iron and Potassium
  • A high energy source (great for those involved in strenuous physical activities) 
  • An excellent substitute to grains containing gluten 
  • Contains antioxidants
  • Can be consumed by people with sensitive digestive systems and is non-allergenic (for those who are allergic to nut flours)

Ingredients

Cassava Flour.

Directions for use

Use as you would any flour for cooking or baking.

Caution: Should not be eaten raw.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Neem Oil (Organic) - For Scalp, Hair & Skin Health
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Hair & Skin
Price: 92.00

Earth Tribe's Neem Oil (50 ml) is organic and sustainably harvested in Africa. It moisturises skin and hair, while containing strong anti-microbial properties to cure various disorders.
  • An excellent moisturising oil with both insecticidal and medicinal properties
  • Traditionally used as for its anti-viral, anti-fungal, antiseptic, antibacterial and anti-parasitic properties
  • Helps in the treatment of many skin conditions, including eczema, psoriasis, dermatitis, ring worm, fungal infections and chickenpox
  • Increases micro-circulation, supports healthy hair growth and can reduce thinning and hair loss
  • An indispensable addition to the natural health and beauty medicine chest!

Ingredients

Cold-pressed neem seed oil

Directions for use

Massage a few drops of Neem Oil to your skin or hair twice a day for best results.

    Disclaimer: This product has not been evaluated by the Medicines Control Council. This medicine is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure or prevent any illness.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Mojo Pills - For Increased Sexual Energy & Vitality In Men
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Male Health
Price: 144.00

Earth Tribe's Mojo Pills (35 veggie caps) is made from Mondia Whitei root powder (commonly known as African White’s Ginger) and is traditionally used as an aphrodisiac to treat sexual weakness, prevent premature ejaculation and to increase sperm production.

  • Rich in sterols tritapenes, alkaloids, saponins, tarnins, flavanoids, alkaloids, glycosides, phenolds and terpenoids
  • Aids depression and low energy levels
  • High in micronutrients
  • Increases human sperm motility
  • Boosts testosterone levels, stamina and erections

Ingredients

Mondia Whitei root powder in a vegetable capsule.

Directions for use

Take one Mojo Pill in the morning and one in the evening with water.

entry.title: African Zumbani Balsamic Fever Tea - Manage Symptoms of Colds/Flu's
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Health Teas
Price: 109.50

Earth Tribe's Africa Fever Tea (75 g) is wild-harvested in Zimbabwe, bringing you a balsamic medicinal herbal tea traditionally used to manage colds and flu's, boasting a delicious, strong balsamic citrus-like scent.

  • Helps manage symptoms associated with colds/flu's: coughs, bronchial problems, fevers, headaches
  • Treats Dysentery and Diarrhea
  • Zumbani (Lemon Plant) has been used in Africa for generations for its analgesic, anti-inflammatory, anti-pyretic and anti-bacterial properties 
  • Zumbani is caffeine-free and contains a low percentage of tannins (less than Rooibos tea)

Ingredients

Lippia javanica (Zumbani)

Directions for use

One tablespoon per cup. Soak in boiling water for 5 minutes before draining.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa
Herbal teas for colds and flu

entry.title: Frankincense - Calming & Cleansing Ethiopian Incense Resin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Home Products
Price: 144.00

Earth Tribe's Frankincense (50 g) is an exotic Ethiopian resin that seeps from the bark of African Boswellia Rivae trees and sacred to many. Frankincense is an African medicine, incense and perfume that's used to purify places, bodies and minds, in additional to useful antibacterial properties and a warm, sweet aroma. 

  • A useful incense resin for home, car or office cleansing
  • Healing and calming and said to purify the air due to its antibacterial properties
  • Traditionally used to cleanse places of negative energy, as it creates a sacred and peaceful atmosphere, promoting relaxation of body and mind
  • Ayurvedic practitioners use Frankincense to balance women's hormones, to make tinctures for wounds and to assist in digestion when chewed like gum 

Ingredients

Natural resin

Directions for use

Burn the Frankincense incense by placing a small piece on a lit charcoal puck. This releases the essential oils and fragrances from the resin in an aromatic smoke.
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

entry.title: Jugo Beans - Powerhouse Savoury Legumes
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Superfoods
Price: 103.50

Earth Tribe's Jugo Beans (1 kg) or Bambara groundnuts, are nutritional legumes packed with protein, fibre, B vitamins, irons and potassium, and low in fat. Highly underrated and superior to other beans and legumes.

  • Jugo Beans have such a powerful natural savoury flavour with a hint of sweetness, that you don’t need to add anything but salt to enjoy
  • Rich in phytochemicals, they help lower the risk of heart disease and contain a wide range of cancer-fighting plant chemicals
  • A rich source of soluble fibre and saponins - phytochemicals that help lower unhealthy cholesterol levels in your bloodstream
  • When consumed, they slow down the release of sugar to give you a steady supply of (glucose) energy

Ingredients

Jugo Beans.

Directions for use

To cook, first wash and submerge well with fresh water to soak overnight. Before cooking, drain well and rinse again. For every 1 cup of beans, add 2 cups of water or more – as they cook, they make a thick, soupy brown sauce that can be used in soups and stews for a savoury burst of flavour. Bring to the boil, then lower the heat to simmer – covered – for around 1 to 1 ½ hours. Only add salt at the very end, as salt tends to harden beans while they are cooking.

Eat plain as a snack, or add to rice for a pilaf, or roast in the oven, or add to your favourite tomato sauce for a delicious protein b
entry.s:tag: Earth Tribe wholesale distributor South Africa

Earth Tribe's Myrrh Resin (50 g) is an exotic Ethiopian resin that seeps from the Commiphora Guidotti plant that emits relaxing, antiseptic, anti-inflammatory and sweet aromas, used for grounding and relaxation.

  • A relaxing, antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, sweet-smelling, fruity sweet incense resin
  • Cleanses places of negative energies due to antibacterial and anti-inflammatory properties while lifting energies 
  • High in antioxidants and 100% natural
  • Helpful for skin infections such as athlete’s foot, ringworm, weeping eczema, bedsores, boils, carbuncles, and acne

  • Burned as an air purifying agent, clears and lifts the mood

Ingredients

Natural resin

Directions for use

Burn the incense by placing small piece on a lit charcoal puck. this releases the essential oils and fragrances from the resin in an aromatic smoke.

entry.title: African Black Soap - Deep Cleansing & Repairing For Skin
entry.summary:
Vendor: Earth Tribe
Type: Bath
Price: 115.00

Earth Tribe's African Black Soap (175 g) is a traditional cleansing, moisturising, skin loving treat, made with a base of organic shea butter, cocoa butter and the ashes of cocoa pods.

  • Gently exfoliating to remove dry or flaking skin, as well as dirt
  • Gentle enough to be used on babies' skin
  • Washes away excess oil while absorbing toxins and odours
  • Rich in anti-ageing nutrients like Vitamins A and E
  • Moisturises and repairs dry skin
  • Suitable for all skin types, including skin with acne problems
  • Can be used as a shampoo and shaving cream!

Ingredients

Unrefined shea butter, palm kernel oil, virgin coconut oil, cocoa pod ash

Directions for use

Lather African Black Soap onto your skin when showering/bathing. Rinse off.
